entry.title: Probiotics 30 Billion CFU's
entry.summary:
Vendor: GloryFeel
Type: Capsules
Price: 18.99

GLORYFEEL – MAKES YOU FEEL BETTER!

Probiotics 30 Billion CFU's, Developed In GERMANY, 18 Most Efficient Strains, Plus Prebiotics For Women and Men, 60 Capsules

Gloryfeel - Probiotic is the ultimate supplement for your gut flora. Designed by our experts in Germany and produced in America, this is the perfect supplement for all men and women who want a healthy life.

Developed in Germany

Gloryfeel's Probiotics supplement is created by Germany's best nutrition experts. We consulted our German research scientists and they carefully designed a product with the most efficient composition. To defend us from all forms of harm, our immune system is in constant need of probiotics. Therefore our specialists put hard work into a product which is 100% designed for you.

Produced in the USA

To guarantee best and highest quality and all bacteria cultures are produced in FDA registered and GMP certified facilities. Even if we evolved the product in Germany, to go beyond Gloryfeel's Probiotics had to use premium american bacteria strains.

30 Billion CFU's and 15 Strains

The result of German quality research is, that 30 Billion CFU's is enough, but not too much, and the 18 diverse strains are both the most essential and proven to be good. Instead of capsules (96% of the CFU's are killed by your stomach acid if you take capsules!) we developed special delayed release tablets.

Natural and Organic

All used bacteria strains are naturally in your body and the tablets are vegan, vegetarian, kosher and gluten free.

 

For the list of ingredients, please see the label which is available under "photos"

 

Trust in Probiotics by Glorfyeel, because

GLORYFEEL - MAKES YOU FEEL BETTER
